__e: I am myself indifferent honest, and yet I could accuse me of more things it were better my mother had not borne me.
Are you saying that things were better back then... even though there was stuff like this?
Your father is gone, and lots of things like this are going to happen, and I need to know how to fix them.
I've seen a few cases like that in my time.
I see at least five such cases everyday.
Two cases of personal enmity against two harmless old ladies in the same neighborhood in one week?
